name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A user on V2EX said that he encountered a work order. The user unit required to set the leader's desktop wallpaper. Every time the computer was turned on, the mouse would block the leader's portrait. The user wanted to modify the default mouse position or not display the mouse to achieve the effect of not blocking the leader.

name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 17, the "evil mother-in-law" incident in Jieyang
A woman in Xichang Town, Jieyang City, Guangdong Province chose to jump off a building because of long-term abuse from her in-laws, which later aroused the anger of local residents. Angry people gathered at the door of the family to accuse and throw eggs. At one time, thousands of people gathered at the scene
It is said that the woman was 27 years old and had a 3-month-old child. She became pregnant after getting engaged to her husband, and her dowry was 188,000 yuan. However, her mother-in-law disliked her for not giving her a car and a house, and kept accusing her of getting pregnant before getting married. She was not allowed to turn on the air conditioner during the confinement period, and had to do housework and high-intensity labor. Finally, she chose to jump off the building because she could not bear it. Such an experience aroused the dissatisfaction of the surrounding people, and many people drove to throw eggs to vent their anger.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 20, parents of the third grade class five of Zhengzhou Zhengdong New District Foreign Language Primary School collectively went to the Education Bureau to protest with banners and jointly requested the Education Bureau to put pressure on the school to deal with a campus bullying incident.
It is said that a student named Li in the class was violent against several students in the same class, and his parents were unreasonable and tough in communication but to no avail. The head teacher mediated and asked the victim's parents to give Li a chance to correct his mistakes.
In the end, the parents had no choice but to protest

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 20, Taiwan launched the evacuation of its citizens from Israel. Previously, 35 Chinese mainlanders had been in contact with the Taiwanese representative in Israel, hoping to leave on a chartered flight. However, when they asked for passports and other relevant information after the charter flight was confirmed, they did not receive any response.
